data.name: PTC4thAnniversary
data.value: PTC 4th anniversary

data.name: PTC4thDate
data.value: Jan 10th, 2014 – Jan 10th, 2018

data.name: PTC4thDiscription
data.value:
We – PTC are different and special thank to the cutiness, talent and different thinking of every single of our member, partner and guest. Thank you for your support and co-operating with us for previous years and even now to the future! Thank you for coming to our Anniversary today to celebrate the day when us – PTC was born!
Thank you – our members, every smile on your face will broaden our image to more and more not only customers but also potential partners which is a HAPPY HOUSE and a HAPPY JOB, a place where you belong. We hope that our commitment will always make you believe and co-operate with us until we gain our successes together! Yours faithfully,

data.name: About_Deliverer
data.value: Deliverer

data.name: About_DevelopmentOrientation
data.value: Development orientation

data.name: About_DevelopmentOrientation_Discription
data.value: In the future, PTC will make every single effort to focus on building and improving Lifeskill; Career orientation – Vocational; consulting structure and strategic plan for businesses; Educating and specializing university curriculum not only in Vietnam but also other nearby countries.

data.name: About_Development_1
data.value: In order to catch up with the world developing trend, Viet Nam has made a lot of effort to apply latest modern technology into Economics and Social activities.

data.name: About_Development_2
data.value: However, there are troubles due to lack of essential abilities, skills and managing system. By recognizing this current status of our country, We – PTC Investment and Education were born in order not only to stablize government policies and managing capability but also to provide services for government’s human resources

data.name: About_Development_3
data.value: Coming along with what we have done within 10 years, We – PTC are reinforcing our mission by developing people and education system. That’s the reason why LifeSkill Institute was established.

data.name: About_Development_4
data.value: By recognizing ethical values and human capabilities, LifeSkill Institue was designed with training programs that are suitable with a variety of types of people, which are before engagement course, soft-skills and lifeskills for kindergarten children, primary children, secondary children and teenagers courses.

data.name: About_Development_5
data.value: By committing to improve within science base, PTC created Statistics Institute in order to update, apply and develop research methods that are being used all over the world.

data.name: About_Development_6
data.value: Statistics Institue is a core element in our system, especially it provides modern and professional research methods and skills for those who are strongly interested in analyzing datas for making business decisions or building business stategies.

data.name: About_GrowupDiscription_1
data.value: PTC changed its head office location to Rosana Building, at Ground Floor, on 60 Nguyen Dinh Chieu Street, Dakao Ward, District 1, HCMC

data.name: About_GrowupDiscription_2
data.value: : PTC changed its name from PTC Training and Education Joint Stock Company to PTC Investment and Education Joint Stock Company

data.name: About_GrowupDiscription_3
data.value: PTC had its first subsidiary

data.name: About_GrowupDiscription_4
data.value: PTC registered business operation with 32 careers

data.name: About_GrowupDiscription_6

data.name: About_GrowupDiscription_7
data.value: PTC Training and Education Joint Stock Company was established.

data.name: About_GrowupDiscription_8

data.name: Letter_Header
data.value: Message from PTC chairman

data.name: Letter_p1
data.value: Dear our potential client,

data.name: Letter_p2
data.value: We, PTC – Investment and Education Joined Stock Company, are honoured to be one of your partners in co-operating, supporting, building training programs and organizing events for years.

data.name: Letter_p3
data.value: We have over 250 qualified lecturers, experts – who have particular experiences in their fields, grew up from failures and gained specific successes which proved their talents. They were selected carefully with high demands in major, experience and skills. They also have to satisfy company’s core values, which are having warm heart, bright mind and different thinking. Regarding to PTC vision and mission, we have already created a lot of programs realting to life skills, soft skills which are suitable with a wide range of customers. We also modify and improve them in order to catch up with the world modern trend in global education system. Our mission is to create unlimited source of energy for customers to discover their potential, as well as create their own brand image, targets and follow their life goals until the end of the world. That is the reason why we always upgrade our training models, fill in missing pieces in our products so that when they are launched, our customers will receive every single value we created

data.name: Letter_p4
data.value: We, PTC, are proud of our training models, which help lots of companies, especially administrative businesses, domestic companies and foregin owned companies succeed in training and teaching. We have done that through our consulting and training programs, which help change a lot in our partners’ strategies, working environment and even specific methods in descirbing, motivating their employees also. Regarding to those things mentioned above, employees have more reasons to stay, to dedicate their talents, their time and their heart for their organization.

data.name: Letter_p5
data.value: We, PTC, are always happy to be your partner not only at the present, not only when we are both success, but we also hope to co-operate in long-term. We are not just partners, we are friends, we are parts of a big network - education.

data.name: Letter_p6
data.value: Last but not least, we strongly want to wish you succeed in your path, always reinforce and upgrade in the future and become a big reputation corporation as your vision has pointed out!

data.name: Letter_p7
data.value: Yours faithfully

data.name: Letter_p8
data.value: Chairman

data.name: Letter_p9
data.value: Dr. Nguyễn Khánh Trung

data.name: LS_Class1_Age
data.value: (from 3 to 6 years old)

data.name: LS_Class1_Customer
data.value: Kindergarten children from 3 to 6 years old

data.name: LS_Class1_Lecture
data.value: Doctors, Specialists, Psychiatrists , Psychology, Sociology teachers

data.name: LS_Class1_Message
data.value: How children from 03 to 06 years old can transfer passive activities at school into true Life skills in order to perform a distinct identity, perfect personality, morality, lifestyle in the goal that PTC Life Skills Institute towards.

data.name: LS_Class1_Name
data.value: Life skills for kindergarten course

data.name: LS_Class1_Target_1
data.value: Life skills education not only enriches the skills needed for a child's life but also helps them to improve their personality, morals and lifestyle

data.name: LS_Class1_Target_2
data.value: In order to form this foundation, the program not only requires newborn children to attend school but must be implemented from birth and parents are first and most important teachers to teach children those skill.

data.name: LS_Class1_Target_3
data.value: ake the future wing for the young generation of VietNam - Rich knowledge - Understand skill- Immersive personality and ethics as human being.

data.name: LS_Class2_Age
data.value: (from 7 to 12 years old)

data.name: LS_Class2_Customer
data.value: Primary children from 7 to 12 years old

data.name: LS_Class2_Message
data.value: It can’t be denied that kids from 6 – 12 years old often meet psychological and physical impacts, what are they? Afterward, when it comes to grade one, there are bunches of change in studying method and environment: more activitites, more outdoor interaction, more friends,…And when preparing for one of the most important time in a child life: PUBERTY. What should parents prepare for their kids in every single stage?

data.name: LS_Class2_Name
data.value: Life skills for kids course

data.name: LS_Class2_Target_1
data.value: - Providing suficient skills which help prevent and reduce school violence.

data.name: LS_Class2_Target_2
data.value: - Providing methods to build life goals.

data.name: LS_Class2_Target_3
data.value: - Applying concentration skills and effective examining methods

data.name: LS_Class3_Age
data.value: (from 13 to 15 years old)

data.name: LS_Class3_Customer
data.value: Secondary children from 13 to 15 years old

data.name: LS_Class3_Message
data.value: Personalities and hobbies start being formed while children growing up, they will observe and identify social problems around them. Kids begin to behave like adult and recognize the differences between them and their parents. Besides, they may lie to their parents and want to live independently. Thus, are they wrong? What kind of skills should parents provide for their children?

data.name: LS_Class3_Name
data.value: Life skills for children course

data.name: LS_Class3_Target_1
data.value: - Providing suficient skills relating to personal finance management.

data.name: LS_Class3_Target_2
data.value: - Providing knowledge about sexual equality, gender and behavior while children growing up.

data.name: LS_Class3_Target_3
data.value: - Understanding Vietnam civil law – rights and responsibilities while children growing up.

data.name: LS_Class4_Age
data.value: (from 16 to 20 years old)

data.name: LS_Class4_Customer
data.value: adolescent from 16 to 20 years old

data.name: LS_Class4_Message
data.value: In the age of 16 to 20, there are significant changes in both physical and psychological of a child. This is the most sensitive time when children are completely vulnerable. In this range of age, children are able to identify themselves and don’t want to be treated like a kid, also want to prove that they are independent from their family and their friends. In order to do that, they tend to act and behave like an adult. So, the question is: what kind of skills should parents equip for their children?

data.name: LS_Class4_Name
data.value: Life skills for adolescent course

data.name: LS_Class4_Target_1
data.value: - Providing suficient skills relating to persuasing and negotiating

data.name: LS_Class4_Target_2
data.value: - Practising effective time management skill.

data.name: LS_Class4_Target_3
data.value: - Providing self-management skill and building personal brand image skill.

data.name: LS_Class5_Age
data.value: (from 18 years old and above)

data.name: LS_Class5_Customer
data.value: (from 18 years old and above)

data.name: LS_Class5_Lecture
data.value: Specialists, Business structure consultants, Startup entrepreneurs, Economic trainers

data.name: LS_Class5_Message
data.value: In start-up zone, there is a lot of friends who succeeded with their start-up projects, who used to be school mates, who used to spend 10 hours a day just to find out start-up idea. Despite the diffrences in their paths, they all have strong commitments. But, what is the most amazing and meaningful things of starting up? And how to start-up successfully?

data.name: LS_Class5_Name
data.value: soft skill and start-up skill for adolescent course

data.name: LS_Class5_Target_1
data.value: - Providing sufficient knowledge about economics, such as: strategies management, business plan development,… in order to create and put an idea into action, which is available and feasible to execute.

data.name: LS_Class5_Target_2
data.value: - Practising essential skills to design and create a detail business plan so as to present, introduce it to the potential investors and besides be able to operate the company depends on that plan.

data.name: LS_Class5_Target_3
data.value: - Practising through exercises/real projects in order to form professional attitude and especially the passion to succeed on your own career path.

data.name: LS_Class6_Age
data.value: Source lectures or those who aspire to become proffessional trainers in the future.

data.name: LS_Class6_Customer
data.value: Source lectures or those who aspire to become proffessional trainers in the future.

data.name: LS_Class6_Lecture
data.value: Experts on training, Teaching and quality assessment, Proffessor, Senior specialists

data.name: LS_Class6_Message
data.value: A successful education system is a system concerned with finding the right person who wants to do this job for life! There is no special "recipe" for education as well as there is no secret formula for judging lecturers whether he or she doing it right or wrong? It's just simply that we try to create and innovative thing in a very conductive way, empower teachers more and more! Look for learners to know the quality of teaching! Education policy has to evidence-based!

data.name: LS_Class6_Name
data.value: Life skills and knowledge for source lectures

data.name: LS_Class6_Target_1
data.value: - Be equipped with the knowledge, skills and pedagogical research programs.

data.name: LS_Class6_Target_2
data.value: - Practice internships at school at affiliated institutions to develop the skills of future teachers in variety of classes, ages, and pupils.

data.name: LS_Class6_Target_3
data.value: - Adding the skills and knowledge to teach each subject or teaching a variety of topics can change the work by adding only the missing certificate, but do not need to re-learn

data.name: LS_Function
data.value: Function of Life skills

data.name: LS_Function_Content
data.value: Regarding to our mission is to help improve Vietnamese’ personality, enhance your potential, contribute to social development, we – PTC commit to make every effort to train and walk with you through every single stage of your life.

data.value: Walking with you through every single stage of your life

data.name: LS_PhamVanTru
data.value: Doctor Pham Van Tru

data.name: LS_PhamVanTru_Discription
data.value: Deputy Director of HCMC mental hospital. Expert of Psychiatric department and medical psychology department.

data.name: LS_Premarried_Customer
data.value: Adolescent, young couples who are in love or about to marry.

data.name: LS_Premarried_Discription
data.value: Before you say “I Do”, family happiness is now a challenge for young couples, who dare to break every limitation, who have zero knowledge about sex and gender, who are going beyond social norms and destroy their own happiness. According to PTC reseach result, almost young couples who are in relationships or about to marry haven’t had enough knowledges, skill and attitude about love, about life after marriage. So, how to have a real love? Who to build your family happiness? And how to create a bright and smart future for young couples nowsaday?

data.name: LS_Premarried_Lecture
data.value: Group of specialists, doctors, psychiatry experts, psychologic lecturers, socialogy lecturers.

data.name: LS_Premarried_Name
data.value: Life skills and Pre-marriage essential knowledge

data.name: LS_Premarried_Target_1
data.value: To help young generation understand clearly about love and have suitable attitude in marriage.

data.name: LS_Premarried_Target_2
data.value: To support sufficient knowledges about young love, about love after marriage.

data.name: LS_Premarried_Target_3
data.value: To prove how important are parents in building their children future.

data.name: LS_WalkWithYou
data.value: PTC - walk with you through every single stage of you life

data.name: PA_Class1_Customer
data.value: Leaders and Entrepreneurs or those who asprire to become leaders in the future.

data.name: PA_Class1_Message_1
data.value: Modifying a underlying system platform and existing enterprise functional systems to create new system models with the lastest functionalities and features that are highly competitive and optimized.

data.name: PA_Class1_Message_2
data.value: Customer orientation and focus on promoting and the advantages of enterprises to bring added value for customers to develop sustainable business.

data.name: PA_Class1_Name
data.value: soft skill & leadership knowledge for businessman course

data.name: PA_Class1_Target_1
data.value: - Establish organizational structure and operating mechanism consistent with the orientation to develop and re-establish customer-oriented and effective business proccess.

data.name: PA_Class1_Target_2
data.value: - Improved statistical processes (SPCs) and process control indicators (KPIs).

data.name: PA_Class1_Target_3
data.value: - Build an improved cultural environment and adapt to change.

data.name: PA_Class2_Customer
data.value: Officials, Civil servants, Government Officers, Staffs

data.name: PA_Class2_Message
data.value: How to innovate the govement system? How to build and improve the quality of the contingent of cadres and civil servants, focusing strongly on the reform of wage policy in order to conduct a real motivation for officials and public servants to perfrom public duties. Quality and efficiency? How to improve the quality of administrative services and tha quality of public services?

data.name: PA_Class2_Name
data.value: soft skill and knowledge of public administration

data.name: PA_Class2_Target_1
data.value: - To equip and update officials and civil servants with common knowledge about managerment and leadership.

data.name: PA_Class2_Target_2
data.value: - Training, fostering and training of essential soft skills attached to tittles and job placement requirements of cadres and civil servants at all levels.

data.name: PA_Class2_Target_3
data.value: - Contribute to build appropriate behaviors and attitudes of cadres, civil servants and officials at all levels.

data.value: Head of Vietnamese culture department at University of Social Sciences and Humanities – Vietnam National University of Ho Chi Minh city. Having over 20 years working and teaching about Culture, Linguistics, Editor of Political Science magazines.

data.name: PA_WhyPTC
data.value: Why PTC?

data.name: PA_WhyPTC_Content_1
data.value: We have over 10 years experiences in consulting and training inside and outside the country with successful training module which customers can practise with Experts and also apply it into daily life.

data.name: PA_WhyPTC_Content_2
data.value: We have groups of qualified experts, who were carefully recruited and were enthusiatic with their mission – our vision.

data.name: PA_WhyPTC_Content_3
data.value: We commit to provide qualified documents, studying papers which were written and updated by our group of experts. Our documents will be carefully researched so that will be really close to global education system before launching.

data.name: PA_WhyPTC_Ending
data.value: No matter if you are finding your job or you are running your own business, we – PTC always commit to provide you not only essential knowledges but also practical skills to improve your work and your career path. we commit that our training courses are flexible and practical enough for you to choose, and our Certificate is highly appreciated by top recruiters in not only Vietnam but also foreign companies.

data.name: ST_Bussiness
data.value: businesses

data.name: ST_CouncilOfScience
data.value: PTC Statistics Institute council of Science

data.name: ST_Discription
data.value: In 2018, PTC Statistics Institute aims to develop our core lecturer team with quality verified and a wide range of teaching field. Besides, we will expand the number of students, increase the number of businesses that need consultant and especially firgure out more and more research methods that are close to the world science council. Regarding to that, we also want to help apply these knowledges into daily life.

data.value: Professional in anaylyzing statistic datas in Mathematical Statistics Department. Teaching data analysis with SPSS, AMOS. Supporting classes which are related to research in business, datas analysis and be a partner of Data Analysis Centre in University of Economics, HCMC.
